# `WheelPickerItem` Definition

An item in a wheel picker

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | No | Unique identifier for the item (generated by backend) |
| title | `string` | Yes | Title of the item |
| value | `string` | No | Value of the item |
